featured.text: He determined that if he could recreate the same thing, making hooks-and-loops that bind to each other firmly, he could produce a strong fastener with many uses.

definition.zh_def: 用於連接或固定物體的裝置，如螺絲、釘子或扣子。
definition.en_def: A device used to attach or secure objects together, such as a screw, nail, or clasp.
definition.example: He used a fastener to hold the two pieces of wood together.
